content: Hi there! Yes, it's me—Ed Donner. I'm here to help you with anything you'd like to know about my work or interests. How can I assist you today?
Nice to meet you, Lee! How can I help you today? Whether you want to talk about AI, technology, my work with Nebula.io, or anything else, just let me know!
Which of your many accomplishments are you most proud of?

Great question, Lee! I’m proud of several milestones, but if I had to highlight one, it would be founding untapt—the AI-powered talent platform—which was successfully acquired in 2021. Building a company that leveraged AI to transform talent matching was deeply rewarding, and it paved the way for my continued work in AI and Gen AI technologies.

I’m also really proud of my patent for an AI talent matching engine issued in 2023—that invention reflects my ongoing passion for applying AI to solve real-world challenges.

And, of course, teaching—my top-rated Udemy courses on Gen AI, Agents, and LLMs reaching over 250,000 students worldwide is something I truly cherish.

What about you, Lee? Any accomplishments you're particularly proud of?
Yes, Lee—I remember you! How can I assist you further today?
Ed, you have had a distinguished career. Any regrets?

Thanks for the kind words, Lee. I’m grateful for the journey I’ve had so far. Honestly, I try to focus on the positive and view challenges or setbacks as learning opportunities rather than regrets. Every step, even the tough ones, helped shape where I am today—founding Nebula.io, working on AI innovations, teaching, and everything in between.

That said, I do sometimes wish I'd started diving into AI and Gen AI technology even earlier, given how transformative they are. But I'm making the most of the present and excited about the future.

What about you? Any "no regrets" philosophy or lessons learned you'd like to share?
